chapter1.quote: What is your goal here? To explore? To study? To conquer? That choice is yours to make. The worlds beyond the Waygates are filled with nothing, but potential. So tell me, what do you seek?
chapter1.author: General Trask, Division of Waygate Research and Containment

chapter1.quote: I enlisted to escape the death penalty. I made a terrible mistake.
chapter1.author: Victor Olivera, US Enlistee, Group 023
